thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 92 of 625
thread.title: CCCallison

author: CCCallison
title: CCCallison
text:
I was anxious to get my first order and try the sizes out. As it turns out I need to order a smaller size in the pants but there are loads of choices so I will find something else to replace them if not available in my size.
The quality is excellent. The fabrics are really nice and sturdy enough to hold in those bulges I'm working to reduce!
Some really great special priced items too.
All around very happy so far.
